Class BoxBall

  • java.lang.Object
    • BoxBall
  • public class BoxBall
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a ball at the x and y coordinates, sets its color, diameter, and speed. Ball can be moved by repeated calls to the move() method and it will bounce off of walls of box.
    Version:
    2019.10.8
    Author:
    Erik Cooke

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BoxBall​(int xPosition, int yPosition, int diameter, java.awt.Color color, int outerBottom, int outerLeft, int outerTop, int outerRight, Canvas canvas, int xSpeed, int ySpeed)
      Constructor for objects of class BoxBall.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void draw()
      Draw this ball at its current position onto the canvas.
      void erase()
      Erase this ball at its current position.
      void move()
      Move this ball according to its position and speed and redraw.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoxBall

        public BoxBall​(int xPosition,
               int yPosition,
               int diameter,
               java.awt.Color color,
               int outerBottom,
               int outerLeft,
               int outerTop,
               int outerRight,
               Canvas canvas,
               int xSpeed,
               int ySpeed)
        Constructor for objects of class BoxBall.
        Parameters:
        xPosition - starting x position of ball.
        yPosition - starting y position of ball.
        diameter - sets ball to this diameter.
        color - sets ball to this color.
        outerBottom - location of the bottom line for the outer box on the canvas.
        outerLeft - location of the left line for the outer box on the canvas.
        outerTop - location of the top line for the outer box on the canvas.
        outerRight - location of the right line for the outer box on the canvas.
        canvas - holds the Canvas object.
        ySpeed - sets the amount ball will move on the y axis with each tick.
        xSpeed - sets the amount ball will move on the x axis with each tick.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draw this ball at its current position onto the canvas.

      • erase

        public void erase()
        Erase this ball at its current position.

      • move

        public void move()
        Move this ball according to its position and speed and redraw. If it hits a wall make it bounce off.
